abstract: On Tuesday night, that act vacuuming up all the attention at CMJ was Wild Flag, a new band comprised of members of old bands, that also sounds like many recent bands who have looked to those old bands for inspiration.
snippet: On Tuesday night, that act vacuuming up all the attention at CMJ was Wild Flag, a new band comprised of members of old bands, that also sounds like many recent bands who have looked to those old bands for inspiration.
lead_paragraph: This year's CMJ Music Marathon feels light in established acts, those midlevel bands who are used to the grind of this festival and make it an essential part of their tour schedule. What's left is an agglomeration of small acts, and smaller acts, with the occasional boldface name screaming loudly from beneath the pile.

headline.main: Wild Flag Is What Passes for an Inspirational Supergroup at CMJ
